articles.author: Isabel Vincent
articles.title: Woman orders bogus AirPods off Amazon bigger than her head - New York Post
articles.description: She said she spent the equivalent of $62 for the fake AirPods, which normally retail for more than three times the price.
articles.content:
Maybe they’re AirPods for an elephant.
An online shopper in Dubai who ordered fake Apple AirPods on Amazon in March was stunned when she opened the package to find that they are bigger than her head.
“I got the AirPods from Amazon last month,” said Aleezay … [+444 chars]

articles.title: Call Of Duty: Modern Warfare's Enormous Patch Size Annoys Players - GameSpot
articles.description: With another large update this week, Call of Duty: Modern Warfare's file size is approaching half that of standard console hard drives.
articles.content: Since launch, Call of Duty: Modern Warfare has been steadily growing in size thanks to its frequent, large updates. Following this week's latest patch and additional DLC content, the Modern Warfare file size now occupies close to 200GB on any given platform, … [+3298 chars]
